definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: The students receive the questions in English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 学生会收到中英对照的题目。

sentences.english: It is humanization for this, Chinese and English, we can understood it!
sentences.chinese: 还是这样比较人性化吧，中英对照，都能看懂。

sentences.english: We also have a bilingual, bimonthly booklet we would like to give you.
sentences.chinese: 我们同时也有中英对照双月刊的小册子要送给你。

sentences.english: I used to write some articles about Autumn and all of them are English-Chines.
sentences.chinese: 我曾经写过一些关于秋天的文章，而且是中英对照的。

sentences.english: This form should be filled in Chinese or in Chinese-English.
sentences.chinese: 本表填写采用中文或中英对照。

sentences.english: Introduces pronunciation rules systematically in both English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 中英对照，明确且有系统地介绍美式发音规则。

sentences.english: Bilingual series on modern Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 中国现代文学中英对照系列。

sentences.english: This is humanization for it, Chinese and English, we can understood it!
sentences.chinese: 还是这样比较人性化吧，中英对照，都能看懂。
